did.abstract: President of the National Organization for Women, Michigan Conference from 2001 to 2005; topical files relating to Michigan NOW, to the national office of the National Organization for Women, and to various womenâ€™s issues.

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: The collection was donated by Linda Varonich (donor no. 10259) and came to the library in September 2009. Addition papers have been received.

accruals.p: No further additions to the papers are expected.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open to research.

userestrict.p: Copyright is held by the Regents of the University of Michigan.

prefercite.p: [item], folder, box, Linda Varonich papers, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: Linda Varonich became a member of the National Organization for Women in 1974. She was the North Dallas (Texas) NOW chapter president and served as the Legislative Vice-President of Texas NOW from 1983 to 1986. She became involved in the Oakland County (Mich.) NOW chapter in 1995 and served as the president of that chapter from 1998 to 2000. Varonich was the Legislative Vice-President of Michigan NOW from 1997 to 2001 before becoming the president of Michigan NOW where she served from 2001 to 2005. She was elected to represent the Great Lakes Region on the National NOW Board in 2006.
Varonich was also involved in the Women-Friendly Workplace Campaign and helped to organize the 2004 March for Women's Lives.

scopecontent.p: The papers of Linda Varonich document her activities in Michigan NOW. The papers of Linda Varonich document her activities in Michigan NOW. The collection is arranged alphabetically in two series: National Organization for Women (NOW) and Topical Files.

controlaccess.head: Subjects:
controlaccess.subject: Feminists--Michigan.
controlaccess.corpname: National Organization for Women. Michigan Conference.
controlaccess.subject: Women's rights--Michigan.

scopecontent.p: The National Organization for Women (NOW) series documents Varonich's activities within the organization. This series contains materials from Michigan NOW as well as documents from the national group. Materials include newsletters, leadership lists, financial information and information on state conferences, the political action committee (PAC) and the state coordinating council. Additional documents relating to various issues can be found in the Topical Files series.

The Topical Files series includes a variety of materials, such as correspondence, a diary, flyers, pamphlets, campaign materials, legislative updates and manuals. This series also contains NOW documents such as bulletins, presentations, statements and toolkits that relate to various topics.
